page.title: 07Employment
page.content: The pipe organ builder has been in the Forteviot workshop for 3 years.There are only 6 such builders in the whole of Scotland.His work takes him to England and abroad,and he travels all over Scotland. He has appeared on T.V. and Radio talking about his work. His workshop was built in 1926. The village hall and the workshops were opened by Sir Harry Lauder. At the moment the builder is extremely busy repairing pipes from ST.John's Church and from Killin.He is also repairing a fire / water damaged grand piano from Forres, Aberdeenshire. Two people are employed in the business.
